sentence.Network_en: But during the development of public understanding of science, some phenomena emerge contradictorily to the objectives.
sentence.Network_cn: 但在发展历程中,公众理解科学运动中出现了很多与其宗旨相矛盾的地方.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(30) ... contradictive 倾向于矛盾的 contradictorily 反驳 contradictory 反对的.

list.abs: He argued contradictorily ., 他的辩论自相矛盾.

auth_sentence.content: Frontman Rivers Cuomo is as contradictorily charismatic and slight here as he is on every release, but this can be a hindrance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Frontman Rivers Cuomo is as contradictorily charismatic and slight here as he is on every release, but this can be a hindrance.
